product_list.p_title: Nilkamal Freedom Plastic Free Standing Cabinet
product_list.p_desc: A multi-purpose storage solution, the Nilkamal Freedom mini Cabinet is a must buy for every home. Compact in structure, its polypropylene body makes it sturdy and strong. Easy to maintain, it is lightweight and portable and can be placed in any part of the house. House all your essentials safely in this cabinet, which is easy to assemble and dissemble. Light weight, hence portable it comes with two shelves for storage. With a great design and a weather brown finish this product has two handles in the form of grooves which allow the doors of the cabinet to be opened easily. Storage is no more a hassle with this great product from the house of Nilkamal.

product_list.p_title: HomeTown Prime 3 Door Wenge Engineered Wood Almirah
product_list.p_desc: Available In 2 door, 3 Door and 4 Door Wardrobe Lockable External Doors Stain And Water Resistant melamine finish Comes with a 1 year warranty from HOME TOWN against manufacturing defects All sides exposed to atmosphere are covered with PVC edge banding to safeguard product from moisture All panels are laminated from both sides to avoid fungus formation, moisture absorption and improve life of product
